metadata.title: CVE-2018-19759 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: There is a heap-based buffer over-read at stb_image_write.h (function:stbi_write_png_to_mem) in libsixel 1.8.2 that will cause a denial ofservice.

criterions.comment: libsixel: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
